This refines the interaction by aligning it with economic context, potentially improving model sensitivity to class-based survival patterns. Apply this weighted interaction as a separate feature alongside the original age-class product term, and use a gradient boosting model (XGBoost) with early stopping to prevent overfitting on this enriched feature space. Maintain stratified cross-validation with 5 folds to preserve class balance.
